Package org.concordion.cubano.driver.web.pagegrabber

Class GrabWebPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.cubano.driver.web.pagegrabber.GrabWebPage

  • public class GrabWebPage
extends java.lang.Object

    This program will grab the whole web page including all its images, css and js files and stores them in a single output directory with all urls in html page modified to point to this directory itself.
